flawed_nl_solution:
Since each student needs 10 cups of water per day and there are 200 students, the custodian has to provide 200*10 = <<200*10=200>>200 cups of water.
A jug of water needs 40 cups to be full, so 200 cups of water will fill 200/40 = <<200/40=5>>5 jugs
#### 5

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2000, not 200. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
